TopicTitle: Watch the clouds sail over the sea- on another world.

Articles.Content:
Cassini tracks clouds above the hydrocarbon seas of Titan.

http://www.nasa.gov/jpl/cassini/titan-sea-20140812/index.html#.U-uTSfldUTo
To some people this might seem like an ugly set of photos, but to me, this is breathtaking. It's a good time to be alive.
